Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27114317] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922)(MIC=6.25μg/mL);B. dysenteriae(MIC=1.5μg/mL);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 2592)(MIC=12.5μg/mL);Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 6633)(MIC=1.5μg/mL) ;Fungi:C.albicans (ATCC 2002)(MIC=12.5μg/mL)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27114317] Human red blood cells:3.9% hemolysis at 25μg/ml; 13.7% hemolysis at 50μg/ml; 27.7% hemolysis at 100μg/ml; 45.3% hemolysis at 200μg/ml;Rabbit red blood cells:5.6% hemolysis at 25μg/ml; 15.2% hemolysis at 50μg/ml; 36.2% hemolysis at 100μg/ml; 50.3% hemolysis at 200 μg/ml
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The peptide contains an intra-molecular di-sulfide bridge
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Two novel antimicrobial peptides from skin venoms of spadefoot toad Megophrys minor.
Literature.Author: Yang HL, Shen ZQ, Liu X, Kong Y.
